question: I was just reading an article and it indicated that in a study of women who gave birth and had preeclampsia (study was based on births between 1967 and 1993).  Renal kidney disease was increase by 14%.  I had preeclampsia and my son was born 3 months early (1996) he is fine, but my GFR is a little low and I am having Thyroid issues (Hypo).  Just wandering if anyone else had read anything on this or had any other insite.Thanks S
title: Connection to Preeclampsia and Kidney Disease
